projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my development work across different platforms.
projects.contribution: Designed and developed the entire website from scratch

projects.name: Mr.Daily Bot
projects.description: A feature-rich Discord bot that delivered daily facts, jokes, and historical events to servers. Users could easily manage content delivery with slash commands and customize their daily information feed.
projects.contribution: Developed the entire bot from concept to deployment, including command system, database integration, and automated content delivery.
projects.status: Archived (The bot served over 600+ Discord servers before being discontinued due to hosting and operational costs.)

projects.name: Farmy
projects.description: A feature-rich Discord farming bot with dynamic systems for crop growth, weather, and shop management. Players can plant crops, manage their farm, and adapt to changing seasons.
projects.contribution: Developed the entire farming simulation system including crop mechanics, weather system, and economy
projects.status: Work in Progress - Currently being developed in my free time

projects.name: Discord.js v14 Bot Template
projects.description: A modern Discord.js v14 bot template featuring command handlers, event systems, and slash command support. Helps developers quickly bootstrap new Discord bot projects.
projects.contribution: Created a structured template with handlers for commands and events, supporting modern Discord.js features
